clusters.title: Synology caves, walks back some drive restrictions on upcoming NAS models
clusters.neutral_headline: Synology Reverses Drive Restrictions on New NAS Models

items.title: Synology caves, walks back some drive restrictions on upcoming NAS models

ai_summary: Synology will modify drive restrictions on upcoming Network Attached Storage models.
Initial plans limited drive compatibility to Synology-branded drives.
Community feedback prompted Synology to reconsider the restrictions.
The company will provide more details regarding the changes soon.
The original restrictions aimed to improve data integrity and security.
